TopicTitle: Can't enter buildings / game freezing just started today

Articles.Content:
Last night and every other night this week I've been playing, no issues.

Starting today, I can't enter any buildings right away. I mouse over and they highlight, but clicking does nothing.

After a while I might get into one or two buildings, but they load extremely slow, and eventually the entire game freezes but I can still hear the music playing. Have to quit through the task manager.

I tried doing the following:

- restarting the game

- restarting my pc

- verifying the integrity of the files through Steam

No go on anything. Nothing else has changed with my pc. I didn't install anything new, or uninstall anything, or change any settings. Quite literally played last night, went to bed, logged on today and bam I've got issues.

Well, it could be a variety of issues. You may want to look through this thread, to see if that describes your problem: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game

If not, then please have a look at this thread. It will explain what kind of information we need in order to help you figure out the problem: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Welcome to the forms!

Cheers,

~Claw
